A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi goes completely nowhere and leaves plot holes the force awakens left us to be un-answered or just down right abandoned. The part where snoke died\, having known little to absolutely nothing about him killed all the expectations fans had come to expect. The Luke skywalker that we all grew to understand didn't feel or act like Luke at all. The reveal of Rey's backstory was very cliche\, just plain disappointing and makes her a very boring character to know. I hope Disney gets there act together and understand what the fans want to see and come to expect in a high budget film.
